title: Get over Yourself - Avo
description: Avo is a singer-songwriter, guitar player using elements of modern alternative rock, synths and electronic beats. He creates pleasing melodies, soulful, mysterious lyrics with a unique California sound.

title: Trevor James - Artificial Sweeteners (Ft. Jake Valli).
description: Bassy. Kamakura welcomes Trevor James into the Kamakura Collective. Enjoy.

title: The Jukebox Mixtape.
description: Late night grooves and self-expressive soul. The Jukebox Mixtape drops March 7th. Watch for it on the Kamakura SoundCloud.
